```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}
library(reflow)
options(reflow.quiet = FALSE)

rs <- rules(
  "expr" = rule(
    msg = "multiline expressions should be indented by one level",
    "{",
    ws(nl = 1),
    indent(zero_or_more(any_token(), until = "}")),
    ws(nl = 1),
    "}"
  )
)

match_style(rs, "
test <- function() {
   1 + 2L
  {
     1 + 2
  }
}
")
```
